00055  * Min length of a LLP packet in bytes.

00063 int llp_create_socket(int port) {
00064         struct sockaddr_in server;
00065         
00066         /* Creating the socket. */
00067         llp_socket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
00068         if(llp_socket == LLP_CLOSED_SOCKET) {
00069                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating socket: %s.", strerror(errno));
00070                 return LLP_ERROR;
00071         }
00072         
00073         liblog_info(LAYER_LINK, "socket created");
00074         
00075         /* Settting up the server. */
00076         server.sin_family = AF_INET;
00077         server.sin_port = htons(port); 
00078         server.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00079 
00080         /* Binding the socket. */
00081         if (bind(llp_socket, (struct sockaddr *)&server, sizeof(server))) {
00082                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error binding socket: %s.", strerror(errno));
00083                 return LLP_ERROR;
00084         }
00085 
00086         liblog_info(LAYER_LINK, "socket binded.");
00087         
00088         return LLP_OK;
00089 }
00090 /******************************************************************************/
00091 void llp_close_socket() {
00092         if (llp_socket != LLP_CLOSED_SOCKET) {
00093                 close(llp_socket);
00094         }
00095 }

00097 void llp_listen_socket() {
00098         struct sockaddr_in peer;
00099         u_int peer_address_size;
00100         static u_char packet[UDP_PACKET_MAX_LENGTH];
00101         int packet_length;
00102         
00103         peer_address_size = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00104         
00105         while (1) {
00106                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "listening in socket.");
00107                 packet_length = recvfrom(llp_socket, packet, UDP_PACKET_MAX_LENGTH, 0, 
00108                                 (struct sockaddr *)&peer, &peer_address_size);
00109                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet with %d bytes received.",
00110                                 packet_length);
00111                 if (packet_length < 0) {
00112                         liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error receiving data.");
00113                         return;
00114                 }
00115                 if (packet_length < MIN_PACKET_LENGTH) {
00116                         liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "packet is too small to be valid.");
00117                         continue;
00118                 }
00119                 /*liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet received.");*/
00120                 switch(packet[0]) {
00121                         case LLP_CONNECTION_REQUEST:
00122                                 llp_handle_connection_request(packet, packet_length, &peer);
00123                                 break;
00124                         case LLP_CONNECTION_OK:
00125                                 llp_handle_connection_ok(packet, packet_length);
00126                                 break;
00127                         case LLP_KEY_EXCHANGE:
00128                                 llp_handle_key_exchange(packet, packet_length);
00129                                 break;
00130                         case LLP_DATA:
00131                                 llp_handle_data(packet, packet_length);
00132                                 break;
00133                 }
00134         }
00135         return;
00136 }
